title: ICYMI - Ta-Nehisi Coates Gives His Unique Take on a Familiar World in "The Water Dancer"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Ta-Nehisi Coates Gives His Unique Take on a Familiar World in "The Water Dancer"
description:
Author Ta-Nehisi Coates talks about the fantastical elements in his novel "The Water Dancer" -- set in the Antebellum South -- and shares his thoughts on cancel culture.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
